name: Forms.io by 500apps – WordPress Form Builder Plugin To Create Responsive Forms
author: 500apps

sections.installation:
Installing Forms.io plugin is easy. Follow the steps below to download and activate Forms.io plugin.

1.Download Forms.io plugin from the WordPress page.
2.Go to the Dashboard and activate the newly installed plugin.
3.Login with your 500apps account to start syncing your forms with Forms.io.
4.Select and implement the desired forms on your website.
sections.faq:
What is 500apps?

500apps is an all-in-one suite of SaaS applications for growing businesses to run like a Fortune 500 company. Forms.io is part of the 500apps portfolio that provides best-in-class apps to help you go to the next level.

What is Forms.io?

Forms.io is easy-to-use form builder software that helps businesses create engaging forms and surveys.

Can I cancel or upgrade my subscription at any time?

All forms.io subscribers pay as they go, and you can cancel at any time. There are no requirements for a long-term commitment

Is my and my users’ data safe?

Yes, your privacy is of the utmost importance to us! Your data is stored on a secure cloud-based server, protected by 128-bit encryption and isn’t shared with any third party services.

How is a “user” defined?

Any person with a unique forms.io username and login is a user, Each user’s action while logged on can be tracked and recorded for optimal performance and analysis.

Will my subscription be renewed automatically?

Yes, both monthly and annual subscriptions will be automatically renewed every month and year respectively unless there’s a cancellation scenario.

Does Forms.io offer any uptime guarantee?

Online stability is critical for any business. For that reason, Forms.io is hosted on Google and Amazon cloud to satisfy all demands and at every scale. We’re pleased to announce that forms.io services are now backed up by a 99.99% uptime guarantee.

Who do I contact for additional questions?

We always encourage you to ask all the questions you want to ensure we’re right for you. Contact us at support@forms.io or call us anytime for more information or to share your feedback.
sections.changelog:
1.0

This version added our plugin

1.1

  • Fixed: Checkbox component in public page
  • Fixed: Refresh issue for pre-defined template
  • Changed: Removed Div tag in embed code feature
  • Added: Audio and video component
  • Added: Copy of Response link

1.2

  • Fixed: CSS helper issues
  • Fixed: Clone feature while previewing the form
  • Fixed: Plain text issue in wizard template
  • Fixed: Confirmation pop-up for pre-defined template
  • Added: Auto calculated components
  • Added: Edit response
  • Added: Iframe, permanent form link code
  • Added: Form Analytics
sections.description:
What is Forms.io?

Forms.io is a must-have form builder plugin for any website owner who wants to collect information from their visitors. With our plugin, you can create a form that matches your site’s design and style. You don’t need to be an expert in coding or web development. If you are looking for a way to make it easier for your visitors to contact you, then this form builder plugin is perfect for you. It will help your visitors fill out the form on any device and submit it with just one click.

Top 10 reasons to use the Forms.io WordPress plugin:

  • Create unlimited responsive forms using visual builder and engaging themes.

  • Collect signatures using online form with just a drag-and-drop option.

  • Collect files in multiple formats, Add the files, and Upload fields to any form to collect the files, documents, applications, and many more through a custom file upload form.

  • Automate advanced workflows (multi-level forms) using built-in BPMApp.

  • Collect payments or request signatures without any hassle.

  • Integrate with top 25 CRMs or use webhooks.

  • Add wizards, conditional logic, and compute fields for advanced capturing.

  • Embed forms on websites and blogs for better conversions.

  • Create a new form with built-in Templates and customize them according to your business needs.

  • Available at unbeatable pricing with many cross-app integrations.

With this plugin, you can create surveys, collect feedback, conduct polls, and much more. It would allow you to reach a greater number of prospects with fewer resources. The good thing about our form builder plugin is that it comes with a variety of features that make it easy to design your forms. You can use the drag and drop feature to customise your forms in no time. The plugin also has pre-built templates which you can use as a starting point for designing your form.

Features of Forms.io:

Drag and Drop:

Use a convenient drag-and-drop builder to build extensive forms effortlessly with no coding experience.

Form Templates:

Create forms using built-in templates and get work done faster. Add or remove fields the way you want and publish forms at the speed of light.

Wizard Form:

Create multi step forms to simplify complex forms by sectioning them out onto multiple pages. Fields can be easily dragged and dropped between pages for quick editing at any time!

Form Themes:

Design your form theme from scratch and customise it to your brand standards by adding the brand logo, changing background images, opacity, fonts and colour schema, etc.

File Uploads:

Use the File Upload feature to collect documents, resumes, videos, photos, etc, through forms simply without having coding or tech experience.

Collect Signature:

Add signature fields to your documents using our simple drag-and-drop functionality. Just choose the signature component and drag them over to your document.

Embed Forms:

Design your form and get the form’s source code to copy and add its script to HTML pages. Save and publish it on any web page.

Form Responses:

Manage all responses efficiently by receiving them in one place and analysing them together for data-driven decision-making.

Contact Management:

Obtain contact details of users who have submitted responses along with details of the form.

CRM Integration:

Integrate your contact form with any of the 5+ CRM platforms provided, to sync submissions to your sales pipeline.

Payment Forms:

Choose your payment processing software from the form integration options. Share your form and start collecting payments from the customers thus making sure the transaction data is safe and secured.

Forms.io by 500apps:

  • Collect contact information, gather feedback or complete a purchase order and for many such tasks, Forms.io has got you covered

  • Create simple and beautiful forms with ease using this form builder plugin.

What is 500apps

With our state-of-the-art business applications, 500apps helps SMEs and MSMEs grow like Fortune 500 companies. As part of our combined efforts to help businesses grow, we now offer an All-in-One Suite of 50+ apps across diverse industries, such as Marketing, Sales, Productivity, HR, and Support. Trusted by 91,436+ customers, the company’s vision is to help businesses grow like the Fortune 500 companies.

Pricing & Support:

Download our easy-to-use and powerful multi-purpose form builder now for just US$14.99 which gives you access to a full suite of All-in-One 50+ applications and some great browser extensions

Get up to speed in no time with our free onboarding session
With unlimited features that are too tempting to resist, you are sure to download the plugin right now.

50+ apps and extensions at US$14.99 only?

Yes. At 500apps, our mission is to provide affordable apps that can transform your business at its core and help you grow your business like a Fortune 500 company. With 500apps, we are moving one step forward in the direction of streamlining your business by offering solutions at an affordable price.

While offering lower prices, we continue to offer top-of-the-line innovations. At the core of our pricing model is providing top-notch assistance to our customers.

If you still have questions, our qualified Support team will be happy to help you 24×5 through Email, Chat, and Phone so that you can use the entire suite without any issues.

Avail 10+ seamless integrations with Forms.io:

Stripe:

Stripe integration allows you to structure your instalments using forms. Add your products or services to forms and embed them into your website.

AgileCRM:

AgileCRM integration allows you to send new form data automatically to your Agile dashboard, where you can track and manage your contacts.

ZohoCRM:

Push your form data into ZohoCRM modules automatically and prefill forms using data from CRM modules with the Zoho integration for forms.io forms.

Salesforce:

Easily connect forms to your Salesforce account with a single click. Effortlessly manage leads and contacts.

HubSpot:

Collect data and send them to HubSpotCRM automatically with HubSpot integration for forms. Simplify lead management and automate your sales workflows.

CRM.io:

CRM.io integration with Forms.io allows you to collect data and use it to create records in CRM.io automatically. Gain valuable insights into your customers while avoiding the time-consuming process of manual data entry.
and many more

What more:

If you like this plugin, check out our other projects:

NinjaSEO Plugin for WordPress:

NinjaSEO is an exclusive page grader, web crawler plugin, and SEO plugin with a built-in AI Linkbot and Position tracker to help website owners find and fix pressing issues to improve SEO performance.

PushNinja Plugin for WordPress:

Grab the customer’s attention smartly through captivating offers, CTAs and reach users through multiple devices and techniques using this Real-time Web Push Notifications plugin

Schedule.cc Plugin for WordPress:

Schedule.cc is a user-friendly appointment scheduling plugin that allows users to create events or book appointments and manage all their meetings like a pro and provide their customers with an exceptional experience by leveraging the features of schedule.cc that expedite their business, reducing planning time

Is Forms.io GDPR compliant?

Yes. Forms.io makes GDPR compliance easy and secure for its users as we don’t collect or store any personal data from your forms.

Now that you have read through the extensive list of the features and integrations that come with the Forms.io Form Builder WordPress Plugin, you can imagine why Forms.io is the best in the biz.

Click here to give Forms.io a try
If you choose to use the web (or) desktop application, click here to Sign Up!
